squishmallows.name: Dante
squishmallows.description: Dante makes math practice devilishly fun!

squishmallows.name: Esme
squishmallows.description: Esme's magical horn sparkles when you solve hard problems!

squishmallows.name: Archie
squishmallows.description: Archie loves swimming through multiplication tables!

squishmallows.name: Bip
squishmallows.description: Bip bubbles with excitement for every math adventure!

squishmallows.name: Bubbles
squishmallows.description: Bubbles makes learning math as fun as a bubble bath!

squishmallows.name: Midnight
squishmallows.description: Midnight helps you practice math under the stars!

squishmallows.name: Rainbow
squishmallows.description: Rainbow brings colorful joy to every correct answer!

squishmallows.name: Luna
squishmallows.description: Luna purrs with pride when you get answers right!

squishmallows.name: Cali
squishmallows.description: Cali loves to curl up while you practice multiplication!

squishmallows.name: Mouser
squishmallows.description: Mouser is always ready to pounce on the right answer!

squishmallows.name: Nebula
squishmallows.description: Nebula travels through space to help with math problems!

squishmallows.name: Stella
squishmallows.description: Stella shines bright when you solve problems correctly!

squishmallows.name: Tabitha
squishmallows.description: Tabitha loves to help you practice your math skills!

squishmallows.name: Balto
squishmallows.description: Balto is brave and loyal, just like your math practice!

squishmallows.name: Goldie
squishmallows.description: Goldie retrieves the right answers with you!

squishmallows.name: Pongo
squishmallows.description: Pongo spots the correct answers every time!

squishmallows.name: Purdy
squishmallows.description: Purdy is pure joy when you master multiplication!

squishmallows.name: Spectrum
squishmallows.description: Spectrum brings all the colors of success to your math!

squishmallows.name: Wicket
squishmallows.description: Wicket is wickedly good at helping with math problems!

squishmallows.name: Barda
squishmallows.description: Barda prowls through problems with fierce determination!

squishmallows.name: Billy
squishmallows.description: Billy floats through math problems like a graceful deep-sea dancer!

squishmallows.name: Blitz
squishmallows.description: Blitz dashes through multiplication tables faster than Santa's sleigh!

squishmallows.name: Bruce
squishmallows.description: Bruce has a big bite when it comes to solving big numbers!

squishmallows.name: Charlie
squishmallows.description: Charlie lights up with joy every time you get an answer right!

squishmallows.name: Cheese
squishmallows.description: Cheese squeaks with excitement when you solve problems!

squishmallows.name: Chonka
squishmallows.description: Chonka munches on bamboo while helping you crunch numbers!

squishmallows.name: Danny
squishmallows.description: Danny roars with pride when you master prehistoric math!

squishmallows.name: Edgar
squishmallows.description: Edgar clicks and whistles cheerfully as you solve each problem!

squishmallows.name: Fidget
squishmallows.description: Fidget is sly and clever, always ready to help you find the right answer!

squishmallows.name: Franklin
squishmallows.description: Franklin gives the warmest bear hugs when you solve problems correctly!

squishmallows.name: Gino
squishmallows.description: Gino stretches his neck high to help you reach new math heights!

squishmallows.name: Harry
squishmallows.description: Harry rolls into a ball of joy every time you get an answer right!

squishmallows.name: Lily
squishmallows.description: Lily is gentle and encouraging, helping you count like counting sheep!

squishmallows.name: Marshmallow
squishmallows.description: Marshmallow soars to new heights when you solve tricky problems!

squishmallows.name: Octavia
squishmallows.description: Octavia uses all eight arms to count along with your math practice!

squishmallows.name: Squeaks
squishmallows.description: Squeaks makes tiny happy sounds when you solve each equation!

squishmallows.name: Sweetie
squishmallows.description: Sweetie is as refreshing as getting the right answer on a hot day!

squishmallows.name: Tipper
squishmallows.description: Tipper chirps happily and tips their hat when you solve problems!

squishmallows.name: Todrick
squishmallows.description: Todrick teaches you that slow and steady wins the math race!

squishmallows.name: Uma
squishmallows.description: Uma swims through problems with magical mermaid grace!

squishmallows.name: Vanessa
squishmallows.description: Vanessa spots the right answers faster than you can blink!

squishmallows.name: Wiley
squishmallows.description: Wiley howls with joy under the stars when you solve problems!

squishmallows.name: Wilson
squishmallows.description: Wilson makes a big splash celebrating your mathematical victories!

squishmallows.name: Ximena
squishmallows.description: Ximena is as sweet as getting every answer perfectly right!

squishmallows.name: Yolly
squishmallows.description: Yolly brings cool confidence to even the trickiest math problems!
